issue.title: Trusty: remote_endpoint: Transport endpoint is not connected

content.html:
//cc @tfoote

@scpeters is clearly a regression, there is an example of making it to fail, the patch is small and does not impact the ABI, so I see no reason why not to fix it ASAP. One option is to build our own version of libboost1.54-dev and host it in the OSRF repository, but this comes with the risk of breaking things heavily.

I would recommend that everyone vote on the issue and see if we need a new bug or we can push from there in order to get the patch uploaded. If we don't have any news for the following days, I would go with the patched version into OSRF repository.
